definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Myositis ossificans is a benign condition of heterotopic bone formation.
sentences.chinese: 骨化性肌炎是骨頭異位性形成的一個良性情況。

sentences.english: The primary ossification centers of the vertebral body could found clearly with a variform.
sentences.chinese: 椎體中心的初級骨化中心，影像清楚，外形各異。

sentences.english: In the absence of calcium, levels of the hormonecalcitriol increase.
sentences.chinese: 在缺鈣的情況下，激素骨化三醇濃度增加。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a general strategy of dealing with the ossifying fibroma of long bones which is rare.
sentences.chinese: 目的對少見的長骨骨化性纖維瘤的診治提出總策略。

sentences.english: Objective To improve the diagnosis and treatment of the myosotis ossificans.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高對骨化性肌炎診斷和治療的認識。

sentences.english: Calcitriol was associated with a higher risk of hypercalciuria.
sentences.chinese: 骨化三醇與較高的高鈣尿症危險相關。

sentences.english: The authors reported 5 cases of myositis ossificans progressiva.
sentences.chinese: 報告了5例進行性骨化性肌炎。

sentences.english: This is a case report of a young female patient with myositis ossificans of the hand.
sentences.chinese: 我們報告一例發生在年輕女性手上的骨化性肌炎。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical value of image navigation in the operation of skull base ossifying fibroma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討影像導航下顱底骨化纖維瘤全切的可能性。

sentences.english: The most likely cause of sphenoid dysplasia is defective ossification of the sphenoid bone.
sentences.chinese: 引起蝶骨發育不良最可能的原因是蝶骨骨化不全。

sentences.english: This is the normal fetal growth plate demonstrating the process of endochondral bone formation in a long bone.
sentences.chinese: 正常胎兒生長骨板，顯示長骨的軟骨內骨化過程。

sentences.english: The surgical and prognostic implications of dural ossification are being discussed.
sentences.chinese: 同時討論了硬膜骨化的手術和預後因素。

sentences.english: Bony spicules are seen throughout the centers of ossification, making areas of spongy bone with red marrow between the spicules.
sentences.chinese: 骨化中心有骨小梁構成支架，其間縫隙內充滿了骨髓。

sentences.english: To discuss the clinical features and diagnosis of Myositis Ossificans Progressiva.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討進行性骨化性肌炎的臨牀特徵和診斷要點。

sentences.english: ResultsAfter 5-week immobilization and temporary passive mobilization, HO was successfully induced in all 10 rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 結果10只新西蘭兔均成功誘導出異位骨化。

sentences.english: The femoral head and the greater trochanter showed yellow marrow signals after ossification.
sentences.chinese: 股骨頭及大轉子骨化中心一旦出現即爲黃骨髓信號。

definition: articular capsule (of joint such as knee in anatomy)
